Systeme.io is a CRM platform that allows: Systeme.io is a CRM platform that allows you to manage your contacts, sales, and marketing campaigns.
Your Systeme.io API key. You can find th: Your Systeme.io API key. You can find this in your Systeme.io dashboard under Profile Settings > Public API Keys.
Create a new contact with email and cont: Create a new contact with email and contact fields from your Systeme.io account, with optional tags
Assign a tag to an existing contact - se: Assign a tag to an existing contact - select an existing tag or create a new one
Remove a tag that is currently assigned: Remove a tag that is currently assigned to an existing contact
Locate an existing contact by email addr: Locate an existing contact by email address
Update fields (name, phone, custom field: Update fields (name, phone, custom fields) of an existing contact using fields from your Systeme.io account
Set contact fields from your Systeme.io: Set contact fields from your Systeme.io account
Add custom contact field values (e.g., c: Add custom contact field values (e.g., country, company, etc.)
Choose how to handle tags for this conta: Choose how to handle tags for this contact
Enter names for new tags to create and a: Enter names for new tags to create and assign (only used when "Create New Tags" is selected)
Choose whether to use an existing tag or: Choose whether to use an existing tag or create a new one
Enter the name for the new tag (only use: Enter the name for the new tag (only used when "Create New Tag" is selected)
Select a tag currently assigned to this: Select a tag currently assigned to this contact
The email address to search for: The email address to search for
Select which contact fields to update: Select which contact fields to update
Add or update custom fields with manual: Add or update custom fields with manual slug entry (use empty value to clear field)
Fires when a new contact is created: Fires when a new contact is created
Fires when a new purchase is made within: Fires when a new purchase is made within a funnel
Fires when a specific tag is assigned to: Fires when a specific tag is assigned to a contact
